review: I love the Amazon Fire TV.  I can watch Amazon Prime and Netflix on my big screen and have closed captioning as well.  I bought the holder and have it hanging on the back of my TV.  The only problem I had was that initially Netflix wouldn't start.  I contacted Amazon and they told me how to check and make sure that the newest version of the Fire TV software was installed.  I installed the newest version and Netflix worked perfectly.  I recommend this product.
